description:
RST markup error left trailing "::" rather than creating a code box. 

Found under "Group the policy rules into different policy files" paragraph.

http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/policy_enforcement.html

Thanks
title: RST markup error leaving trailing ::

comments.content:
RST markup error left trailing "::" rather than creating a code box. 

Found under "Group the policy rules into different policy files" paragraph.

http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/policy_enforcement.html

Thanks
